cards.title: Marisa Kirisame
powers: Place the top card of {Marisa}'s deck under the Mini-Hakkero
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now
One player may draw a card now

Place the mini-hakkero next to a hero character card, treating Marisa as that hero's name and you as that hero's player. That hero gains the following power: 'Discard a card. Place the top 3 cards of your deck under the mini-hakkero'. You may no longer use incapacitated abilities

cards.title: Mini-Hakkero, Elemental Furnace
powers: Trash all cards under this card{BR}3+: {Marisa} deals 1 target x energy damage{BR}6+: {Marisa} deals 1 target x energy damage{BR}10+: Marisa deals non-hero targets x energy damage
body: 6+: At the end of your turn, this card deals {Marisa} x-2 fire damage

cards.title: Mini-Hakkero, 'Cooling Elemental Furnace'
powers: Trash all cards under this card. Swap this card to 'Mini-Eight Trigram Furnace'. Reduce damage {Marisa} takes by x until the end of the turn. Cards with the tag catalyst count as 3. {Marisa} deals herself 5 phsychic damage

cards.title: Hard-Working Magician
body: After another player uses a one-shot, {Marisa} may discard a card to take their card into her hand. She plays these cards as herself and discards them to their respective pile

At the start of your turn, {Marisa} deals herself x-1 psychic damage, where x = cards in her hand from other decks. If she has no cards from other decks in your hand, reshuffle this card back into the deck.

cards.title: Borrowed Items
body: If an equipment card outside of your play area would be destroyed, you may place it under this card.
If a hero target deals {Marisa} x or more damage, return all equipment cards under this card to the hands of their players. (x = double the number of cards under this card)
At the start of your turn, you may move a card under this card to the Hini-Hakkero

cards.title: Bamboo Broom
powers: {Marisa} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. You may destroy a card under the Mini-Hakkero.
body: 3+: {Marisa} deals 1 target 3 melee damage
6+: {Marisa} deals up to 3 targets 3 energy damage
10+: {Marisa} deals 1 target x melee damage, where x = number of cards under the Mini-Hakkero

cards.title: Fine Tuning
cards.body: If the mini-Hakkero is on 'Cooling Elemental Furnace', destroy all but 1 card underneath it and flip it.

cards.title: Ordinary Magician
cards.body: One-shots {Marisa} plays may go under the mini-Hakkero instead of the discard

cards.title: Orreries Sun
body: At the start of your turn, this card deals 1 target 0 energy damage
3+: Increase the damage this card deals by 1
6+: At the end of your turn, this card deals 1 target 0 energy damage
10+: Increase the damage this card deals by 1

cards.title: Grand Stardust
body: {Marisa} deals 1 target 1 Projectile damage
3+: {Marisa} deals the same target 3 Fire damage
6+: {Marisa} deals the same target 3 Fire damage

cards.title: Meteonic Debris
body: {Marisa} deals 1 target 1 Energy damage
3+: {Marisa} deals up to 3 targets 2 Energy damage
6+: {Marisa} deals up to 3 targets 3 Energy damage

cards.title: Narrow Spark
body: {Marisa} deals 1 target 1 Radiant damage
3+: {Marisa} deals the same target 2 irreducible Radiant damage
6+: {Marisa} deals the same target 2 irreducible Radiant damage

cards.title: Magical-Waste Recycling Bomb
body: {Marisa} may destroy an ongoing or environment card.
3+: {Marisa} may destroy an ongoing or environment card
6+: {Marisa} deals 1 target 6 energy damage. {Marisa} deals herself 2 energy damage.

cards.title: Mushroom Soup
body: {Marisa} heals 2 HP
3+: Reduce the damage {Marisa} takes until the start of your next turn by 1
6+: {Marisa} heals 4 HP

cards.title: Greedy Magician
body: Reveal cards from the top of {Marisa}'s deck until a Catalyst card is revealed and either put it into play or under the Mini-Hakkero.
Shuffle your deck
